data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Ribeira Grande, Cape Verde.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ribeira Grande, Cape Verde
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Ribeira Grande against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Ribeira Grande words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 12,260 people in the state of Ribeira Grande who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Ribeira Grande
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Ribeira Grande, Ribeira Grande, Cape Verde.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Ribeira Grande, Cape Verde and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Ribeira Grande unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ribeira Grande, Cape Verde has a population of 15,800.

We estimate Ribeira Grande has 1,321 people who might know Jesus, 12,260 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,219 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 11 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Ribeira Grande, Cape Verde that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.
